website_summaries.verdict: This large, easy-to-read calendar makes learning days, weeks, and months fun.
pros: Includes pre-printed month and day cards as well as number cards
Holiday cards and special occasion cards
cons: some packs arrive with missing items

customer_reviews.title: Missing the number 26
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is great. I was so excited about it I began laminating right away. Now I'm out of luck because it came missing the number 26. The 19 was also bent, but you can barely tell after laminating. I want my 26, Amazon! Amazon only gives the option to return the entire thing. Doesn't look like I can get my missing number.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: We *love* this calendar! I homeschool my kids, and everyday we add a new day to our calendar. It came with 1-31 and then some split calendar days as well, and a comprehensive holiday card selection. The blue shell is also very sturdy and wipes clean easily. My 1yo yanks it all the time, and my 3yo has spilled milk on it and it has held up wonderfully. We also store a small American flag in the top pocket to say the pledge of allegiance with. I put some command hooks on a door and hung it on those.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality calendar.
customer_reviews.text: This calendar comes with cards for days of the week, dates and names of the month and some special days like birthday cards, holidays etc; a giant holder with pockets of good enough size to be handled by little hands. The product is sturdy. Also, It has a pockets at the bottom to hold remaining cards which are not in use. So everything stays in its place. It’s a good educational product. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Palak Shah

customer_reviews.title: Sewn Incorrectly, not enough pockets for every month
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this calendar for my preschool classroom , especially for the price. I was very disappointed to see that there is not enough pockets to fit the month & all the days for August. It was also sewn incorrectly so every card that goes in the “Friday”‘column will not fit in the plastic pockets. I was able to get a replacement sent, but I’m still responsible for going to a UPS store (which is 30 miles away) and having it sent back. Would not recommend risking the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar, sturdy and a great size. The large storage pocket has a Velcro tab to keep it shut, the clear sleeves are sturdy and the colors bright. Has every holiday you could imagine, plus birthday and field trip cards. I laminated mine to make them last. Overall a great calendar for our homeschool room!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaM

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it. The paper numbers and labels are card ...
customer_reviews.text: just got my calendar today. I LOVE it. The paper numbers and labels are card stock and thick, but i would recommend laminating them. The blue slip however is very thin, not sure how long it will last. I honestly purchase this product for ALL the labels. I made my own large size calendar. It was def worth the prize, it includes a TON of multicultural holidays, not just US. it was a good buy for me since i didn't want to make and draw each card and label.
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Bymaster

customer_reviews.title: design flaw in center column
customer_reviews.text: the product layout is great and I like the hidden pockets to store the unused cards. However there is a design flaw on one of the columns. The center column is very narrow and tight compared to the rest of the columns which makes it hard to put in the cards and remove them. Hence the cards get damaged on the edges and the stitches on this column are coming off as a result. Maybe I got a defective product, I don't know. But it seems that I will need a replacement in a few months and it shouldn't be so
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast and the product seems like it will last awhile. I think that I would have to laminate the days and event markers, because I think they won't last that long without it. I wish that the days were double sided with different colors so that you could flip them to represent the weekends. It also didn't have markers for "Yesterday, Today, and Tomorrow" but I just cut index cards. Overall it is a good product for the price, I may upgrade in the distant future, but I don't see the need to at this moment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing sheet for numbers 10-17
customer_reviews.text: The product looks awesome, and my son was really excited about it however we did not receive the sheet for numbers 10 through 17 leaving an unacceptable gap in the calendar. Otherwise, the price is right and the calendar is great for engaging little ones.
customer_reviews.author: SeafoodLover

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of a few purchases for my virtual home schooling items. I love it. My son loves it because it was his birthday Month. He was excited to count the days until his birthday arrived. This is very lightweight even with all the slots filled. There are storage pockets at the bottom yo hold the remaining cards. I wish there was a "today is" tab. I made one myself that my son uses to change every morning. And the year would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office/Homeschool Room for my daughter I thought about buying one last year and didn't that really thought it would help teaching about the calendar I'm so glad I bought it I got a really great deal by getting it when it was on sale. The calendar itself is actually bigger than what I was expecting it to be which isn't a bad thing as well as the cards with month and date on it are very sturdy and very vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. I am teaching my daughter the days of the week and the months of the year. This calendar is perfect for that. She loves changing out the months and she is learning every day. The material is so sturdy and it’s an easy set-up. We didn’t buy the stand hangs on. We taped it to our front door with heavy duty double tape and it’s been trying put. The numbers are so big and bright. The pockets are perfect. This is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Servando Jair García

customer_reviews.title: Good size for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Large size for students to see. I suggest laminating the pieces to keep them looking new. Comes with many holidays, birthday, and field trip cards. These cards have nice little designs, so that you can put it on the calendar without putting the number card in front yet. I like that these cards are taller than the number cards, so that they can still be seen after placing the number card in front.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great resource!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was expecting. Lot of options for the kids to use as a learning resource for homeschool this year. I also was able to write my own events on the back of the event cards provided with was great to add our own personal touchs. I thinks this will work great! Nice and big too and easy to work with. Supper pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for homeschool
customer_reviews.text: This calendar was almost identical to the one my son had in his preschool. I wanted to mimic his classroom for this school year, since we are homeschooling and I wanted him to feel some familiarity. Its a nice calendar, lots of inserts for holidays, birthdays, etc. The plastic windows are sturdy and we are loving ours so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rabia Mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Classy and clever!
customer_reviews.text: I recently redecorated my classroom and was so excited to see black charts!!!!!!!! Bye bye blue charts! I love the black! It looks so classic! Thank you! The best part is it has pockets at the bottom! I feel much more organized and it hides clutter. I already had month and number cards, but the holiday cards are adorable and I will be replacing them with the cards I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is asking me where I found such a perfect calendar
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected!!! This is quite fascinating!! Comes with cards that mentions every holiday. I love the storage space to store the extra cards when they aren’t being used. The size is absolutely perfect!! I’m super happy that I purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very good value/price on this item. My kids loves setting up each month and marking the holidays. I did laminate the number cards because while it is a yardstick type material, i feel the constant touching and changing monthly will make them wear faster. Colorful and kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Allshouse

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks exactly like a classroom!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are just learning about dates and months, so I didn't want them to miss out on this key classroom experience. Arrived quickly, super durable, and contains a lot of "extra" holiday and day cards as well. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: misasha23

customer_reviews.title: Good but no year cards
customer_reviews.text: This is sufficient and includes multicultural holiday cards and special day cards. They are uncoated card stock so will wear accordingly. It would have been nice to have a few year cards 2020-2025 or something but there’s no year cards at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mmo6

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I teach little ones so I like that it's a really big calendar. The pocket chart is thick and sturdy enough but if you want them to last I'd recommend laminating the cards and headers. Also wish they were a bit more colorful, but I usually print my own numbers and monthly headers according to our monthly theme anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Darkchild

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Classroom
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a wall in my classroom. Nice and large. Easy to change and update. Love the extra pieces like “First Day of Fall” or “Happy Birthday.” They tuck nicely behind the dates. The eyelets at the top have metal in them so it’s durable. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great resource, but missing months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to teach my toddler more about the concept of why we go to scuool/work some days, but not others. The product is super clear. Love the reusable nature, and the holiday cards that come w it. Giving 4* only as we are missing July/August month cards... We got duplicate May/Jun cards instead!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase!! Since our school year is going to be virtual with the pandemic I wanted something colorful and fun. My son was very excited stating that it was just like his school one. I also feel that it is very durable and sturdy as I let my 7 year old cut out the items and put up the dates himself and nothing tore or ripped. It comes with lots of colorful holiday cards and additional extras like the 100th day of school card. I think it’s the perfect size too, large but not too big. This is completely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall calendar
customer_reviews.text: Nice wall calendar for kids to learn the calendar system. It's good for kids to have low-tech touchable things to learn about the world, in this day & age of digital things. We also make our own labels for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Basically Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if the slots were sewn the correct size but as you can see in the pictures they are not. Can’t even put the cards in the entire first column. So basically this whole thing is worthless and I didn’t open it in time to realize before my return window closed... so now I’m stuck with this worthless calendar and having to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Andersen

customer_reviews.title: 'Chinese New Year' should've been 'Lunar New Year'!
customer_reviews.text: My original order came damaged. They bent it in order to put it in a small bubble bag. One of the pockets was bent. My replacement order came with the same problem. Not only that but also 'Chinese New Year' may be correct for Chinese who celebrate 'Their Lunar New Year' but it is so politically incorrect for non-Chinese Asians who celebrate the 'Lunar New Year'.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Learning Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is the perfect teaching the days of the week and months of the year. Calendar also offer a holidays and days to be noted that I have and have not heard of. This is a great tool for your home school kit!
customer_reviews.author: Veldatheresa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Educational
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of my preschool-homeschool curriculum. Very happy with my purchase. In the 3 weeks we've been using it, my 3 year old mastered all the months of the year in order, counting to 30 almost without help, and can say the days of the week. She has a much better grasp of our schedule and likes to associate activities planned with the calendar. Wish I'd bought it sooner. There are so many holidays, all of the standard ones and then many I've never heard of. Plus several birthday cards. Cute designs too are catch for kids.
customer_reviews.author: C Clarke

customer_reviews.title: What day is it?
customer_reviews.text: my only wish, was that it came laminated. Other than that really good product. Perfect for my classroom and I love that it has several holidays that are no traditional. Perfect for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Watson

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I love it! It came with just about every holiday from around the world which I love! I bought it to use for preschool zoom circles and it workers out great. I also lamented every piece to make it last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Right on time for school!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to hang. This calendar is as tall as a Kindergartener. Has months, birthdays and holidays I never thought to put on a school calendar. It's an excellent practice tool as all kindergarteners need to practice the calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Mama

customer_reviews.title: You can write and mark out the days with dry erase marker
customer_reviews.text: Its so awesome to use it came with everything it said and i have it in my kitchen me n my husband use it more lol it helps to keep up with everything and easy to see n use than an regular calendar
customer_reviews.author: Mrs .Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great Calendar for Price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a large calendar for my daughters (2 and 4) and most are expensive. This one is good quality for a decent price. I hung it with small command hooks and it has held up nicely. The numbers are easy to read and the cards are fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and fun calendar to get my more schooler involved. Great learning tool for the days, months, and holidays. I just wish the cards were a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good school calendar
customer_reviews.text: I choose this since you can add the holidays and still see the date. The months are in easy to read script. Would be great laminated but the thick paper is fine without.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a classroom
customer_reviews.text: Great for my classroom. It has pretty much every holiday you can think of and my favorite part is you can put the holiday/birthday cards behind the dates so it won’t cover them. They stick out of the top of the dates and I love it
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Not same as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Not what i purchased it looks nothing like the picture tthere is no numbers holidays or months its just a blue mat. The slots are not the same or anything. Returning this asap!
customer_reviews.author: Ambie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for morning time calendar work with my soon-to-be 4 year old. I love that I can easily set it up in a way that works for us. The hook and loop closures on the bottom storage pockets are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Cash

customer_reviews.title: great calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Definitely good to buy for your younger kid(s) at home while they're doing distance learning. I have a child who is in kindergarten.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with numbers 2-9
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing that sucked about this purchase was that it came with 2 sheets of the numbers 10-19 and no sheet with the numbers 2-9 factory mess up I’m sure I’m just gonna print some replacements laminate all the cards Everything else looks okay I will be changing Columbus Day to indigenous peoples day and adding moon phases and planting guides because that fits for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Worth My Money
customer_reviews.text: There really is no room for improvement on this product. I understand the concern about little ones tearing it up. But laminating the cards would help that issue. Sure the product could come laminated, but that may raise the cost, and then people would complain about that or complain that the lamination makes the edges to sharp. The complaint about having more than one card to show is just extremely picky and easily solvable. Just use a paper clip to hold sunny over dentist appt with the dentist appt title showing over the top edge of sunny. I appreciate this well-done excellent home school product because I have bought my fair share of junk home school products.
customer_reviews.author: PictureMe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I thought the paper would be really thin, it came with thick papers and good quality! My boy helped to set it up, very easy! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: thelowkey

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar set!!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this calendar. The cards are colorful and themed for seasons/holidays. For example, the card for February has hearts and groundhogs on it. April features ducks with umbrellas in the rain. July has a picnic scene in red, white, and blue with stars, and August has a beach scene. In addition to the date and month cards, there a lots of cards for specific holidays, plus extra cards for birthdays and field trips. Many holidays are included such as Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year's Day, Kwanzaa, and Diwali. The pocket chart is sturdy and just as pictured. Since the cards are made of card stock, I might laminate them for added durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better spacing
customer_reviews.text: I wish the pockets were reorganized for space for the cards not being used. My son enjoys doing calendar math and I let him manage the whole process himself.
customer_reviews.author: Quiana Holmes

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make my daughters virtual space feel like kindergarten! It is great. Great quality & no complaints. Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Arnoult

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pocket chart and the first that I have seen ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pocket chart and the first that I have seen in black. The only complaint I have is the material is very lightweight. I would wish for it to be a little heavier. I love the pocket at the bottom to keep the months not being used. This is a wonderful addition to my classroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Dazite

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar but not enough slots for the long months example this past August there were days in the month and August 1st was on a Saturday so when we got to 31 st there were no more slots not sure why that was
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just as pictured and described! The cards are nice and sturdy and with care will last a long time! My five and six yr old absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for at-home pandemic distance learning. Perfect for the younger set, we do the calendar every day. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wallflower64

customer_reviews.title: Great for our homeschool!
customer_reviews.text: I have a son who struggles a bit with days of the week and what month it is. We homeschool and this is at my boys eye level so we can go over it everyday. I used plastic, self adhesive hooks to apply to our wall and it is holding up great. I also love the extra cards that highlight birthdays and holidays. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morgenthaler

customer_reviews.title: Missing labels
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a 3 stars because it came with missing months of July and August. I’ll need to find or create it myself because I cannot find replacements. Otherwise materials are good quality and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Karla H

customer_reviews.title: Essentially GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Perfect now I feel like a classroom for our kids above all this coronavirus situation and is a key to homeschooling! I recommend for you parents that trying to teach your kids in home .
customer_reviews.author: Zerimar Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this calendar for my daughter when schools shutdown due to the COVID-19 pandemic. It helped to ease the transition into homeschooling. I also use it when doing circle with my students during our teleconference times.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Busch

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and all of the cards included!! Nicely made and easy to keep everything organized in the pocket on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our homeschool classroom. It's very durable and very well made. Exactly what we needed to help us learn
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: reusable calendar holder
customer_reviews.text: I like that this chart is easy to hang and can be used each month. My regular calendar is showing wear and this one will not. I also bought the calendar numbers to go with it. It has good dimensions so it's not overly big or small. I can't wait to start using it! Calendar days/months/numbers need to be purchased separately with this item.
customer_reviews.author: christine suchey

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this calendar for homeschooling my preschool kids and I love it. The pocket calendar seems to be very sturdy. I also love the cartoonish style of the months. The front of the months/days/etc. is glossy, but the back is not. I feel like I need to laminate it just to make it extra sturdy because of toddler hands messing with them, but other than that I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and no hanging grommets.
customer_reviews.text: Product missing parts, day of the month numbers stop at 25. The sheets for higher numbers are missing. Product does not match description, it does not have hanging grommets.
customer_reviews.author: Game Player

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and I love that it is black to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and I love that it is black to match my classroom theme. The pockets at the bottom are perfect for holding extra month or holiday calendar cards.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use calendar for kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a different calendar before purchasing this item This calendar is easier to use cards have clear slots so kids and parents can change the date and month easily
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect!! Reminds my son of his classroom!!! He loves it even want to put the day on there everyday
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Kallmann

customer_reviews.title: Good for teaching young kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar! Bought it to track my 3 year old the days of the week/months of the year. She loves putting the holiday cards in every month. We have made a few of our own since all are not included. Such as Mother’s Day and fathers days. The cards are just cardboard so they bend easy, which I guess can be good and bad with young kids. Over all we like it
customer_reviews.author: Tori B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school at home
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my at home preschool kiddo! Includes all the numbers, months and holidays. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: AR27

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Homeschool Classroom
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in our guest room as part of our sons homeschool area. He is in 1st grade and it is great to have to show the date, holidays, etc. Great quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it only four stars because I wish it had another row of pockets instead of sharing two cards for extra days (30 and 31). I didn't realize there were cards that share dates for months that start at the tail end of the first week or I wouldn't have bought it. I am using it to start teaching months and days to my two and a half year old, so having those cards sharing dates for some months is confusing. Other than that all of the graphics are super cute and I like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: °K.S.°

customer_reviews.title: Very useful calendar.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My kids enjoy knowing what is happening during the month, and we have fun counting down the days for special occasions. It comes with tons of holidays inserts, birthday inserts, field trips, etc. I’ve started using dry erase markers to write directly onto the pockets, when you need to, it just wipes off.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Nakamo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun way for young kids to learn how to track days!!!
customer_reviews.text: omg my 5 yr old is obsessed with this! We got it 2 months ago and its the highlight of his morning to check the date!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: Happy that I received it, but am a bit disappointed that I got two May & June cards and NO July & August cards. Everything else looks good and ready to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharee Keith

customer_reviews.title: A great calendar for kids
customer_reviews.text: We use this at home for every day calendar. I was going to homeschool but then found a great school for my son to go to that offers an IEP for speech therapy. We safety pin doors to the wall and change them out every month it's a good way to remind kids when they're at home what day of the week it is if there's a holiday or even if the family is going on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition to our learning wall! Classroom quality. My second grader loves doing the days of the week like he did in school!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: My children love it! It looks really nice in our multi-purpose room here at home! I turned a corner into a mini classroom for them!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our online/homeschool room! It doesn't take up too much wall space and my daughter enjoys being able to easily change the "today" card every day! Good buy for the price! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elementary classrooms
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is perfect for elementary classrooms. One thing I added was my own card that has the year to hang up on the first pocket as well so it reads the month and year. Just slightly overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for kids
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for kids. My 4yo helped me put it together. Cards are cute. Hope it helps my son figure out what day it is!
customer_reviews.author: Gebbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Shipping came quick. Durable fabric. I thought the pockets would be 3/4 the size of the cards but they are only 1/2 or less hope the cards stay in well over time.
customer_reviews.author: teeny88

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Great for our homeschool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wall calendar! I did laminate all pieces, like I wish I had done on previous calendars. Whats neat about this design is the "pockets", so you can add birthdays, holidays, etc, behind the number of the date, and it shows above the number! And changing months is much easier than taped on numbers! Critical for the homeschooling family, very educational.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Put it up in the playroom where I can do calendar time with my daughters every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great product with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute calendar, though I was disappointed to see that November and December were not included in the package. Instead there were duplicates of two other months. I went onto Carson's website to see if I could order a package of months, but that isn't an option. For now I will just write November and December on the back of the duplicates. Kind of a bummer, as it looks like others have been shorted as well. Hopefully Carson will get a handle on their Quality Control process to ensure this doesn't keep happening.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use for my 5 and 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fun calendar and is helpful for us to keep track of what day it is while we are homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Pepple

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For the price it does exactly what I need. I was more impressed than I thought i would be.
customer_reviews.author: Faridal Mutalib

customer_reviews.title: Perfect calendar for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my kids! Teaching my 3 yr old now and will be using when my 9 month old gets older. Great for visual learning.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our homeschool room! It would even work well in a classroom. It is exactly as described. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Great well made Pocket Chart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our homeschool classroom and it's perfect. The printed numbers, days, holidays etc are printed very nicely on very thick paper and perforated for easy detachment. I am thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David A. Gugg

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my class
customer_reviews.text: Nice wall calendar. My students like to help keep it up to date. If it had a marker for "TODAY" it would be nice. I use a post it note. There are a lot of holiday cards that I don't use. It does have the number cards to help with the over laps of months. It has a handy pocket at the bottom to store cards that are not being used. It is big enough to be read anywhere in the room (when they remember to look).
customer_reviews.author: Waynemia

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this awhile back and used it for about two years. I taught pre school and the children loved helping with putting the cards in their pocket. You will have to laminate the cards so they last longer and it does take up alot of space. Otherwise it served its purpose for which it was intended. It also folds up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged. Can you send new one?
customer_reviews.text: Our item just arrived and it came damaged. My kids are so excited that I don’t want to return, but I wish it was damaged. Can you send a new one? Then I will mail this back?
customer_reviews.author: Steven Peet

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to have found this!!!! This works so much better than my old class calendar for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this - even a 2 year old could learn a lot from this
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm just using it to teach my daughter at home and it has been very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Love&Peace2U

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. This item was purchased from amazon warehouse. There are two pockets on the bottom to hold the month cards and holiday cards. This chart does not include yesterday, today or tomorrow cards but the price difference for charts that include them is a lot more. You can simply type up the words, print them out on card stock and cut them to size. It takes about 5 minutes and saves money. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for primary classrooms
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my classroom! The only thing I wish it had were cards for "No School" days. Otherwise, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marlina

customer_reviews.title: Love the black
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the black. Not wild about the included calendar pieces. Would have rather paid $5 less to not include.
customer_reviews.author: Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Good quality for the money. Signs are good size and sturdy. I will probably have them laminated for longer life. Pocket chart is perfectly set up with storage at the bottom fir extra numbers. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Godlevski

customer_reviews.title: We like it .
customer_reviews.text: I loved this ! I put this in my office / work room for my son . He loves it & now learning the months / days . I use two thumbtacks to hold it up and it holds just fine .
customer_reviews.author: Javeina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basic calendar
customer_reviews.text: My children like it. I would suggest a few changes to holiday names such as Indigenous People's Day rather than Colombus Day. Very good for a basic calendar. We have added the seasons and the pagan holidays as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melismyth

customer_reviews.title: Great Calendar for kids
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my kids for their chores. It is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Aleana

customer_reviews.title: Great base to adapt from
customer_reviews.text: Good quality overall. The cards are northern hemisphere specific - so a bit useless for me but the other cards were great. Lots of uses that it can be used for other than its purpose for the classroom or homeschooling teacher.
customer_reviews.author: HonestOpinionsOnly

customer_reviews.title: I have 33 students so this works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for my classroom. I use it as classroom management. I couldn't find a pocket chart that had more than 30 pockets and this one did. I have 33 students so this works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school rooms!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for our school room! And very engaging for the little one!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hamilton

product_meta.title: Carson-Dellosa CD-158156 Deluxe Calendar Pocket Chart
product_meta.description: Style:Deluxe CalendarHelp students learn about the days of the week and months of the year with this engaging pocket chart. It includes 100 cards including days of the week, months of the year, calendar cover-ups, and holidays!
feature_bullets: 2 storage pockets with hook-and-loop tape closure
Monthly headers, days of the week, date, holiday and special day cards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,282 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
